name: Pet Knight into cave
description:
game introduction
"Pet Knight into cave" is an adventure game for pets to kill. The game has well-designed levels, the special skills of the protagonist's pet, and the entourage recruitment that is willing to fight with you. Most of the levels in the game require the player to click, the faster you click, the faster the boss will die.

Game Features

⚪The battle system of "Pet Knight into cave" is a point kill game. You attack the enemy by tapping the screen. The faster you tap, the higher the attack frequency, and you will get gold rewards for killing monsters.

⚪ The skill system is a major feature, in order to allow players to improve their skills and gain more powerful offensive capabilities in addition to improving their point kills.

⚪ The follower function is also a powerful function. It requires more coins, but the rewards are also good. The followers have powerful attack capabilities and can be upgraded and cultivated.
